metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14951 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The mail message display page in SquirrelMail through 1.4.22 has XSS via a"<form action='data:text" attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14951` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

squirrelmail - 2:1.4.23~svn20120406-2+deb8u3build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: squirrelmail package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.4.23~svn20120406-2+deb8u3build0.14.04.1').
